      • getRegistries

        public static List<org.openbase.jul.storage.registry.RegistryRemote> getRegistries(boolean waitForData)
                                                                            throws org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException,
                                                                                   InterruptedException
        Returns a list of all available bco registries.
        Parameters:
        waitForData -
        Returns:
        a list of remote registry instances.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException - is throw if at least one registry is not available.
        InterruptedException - is thrown if thread is externally interrupted.

      • shutdown

        public static void shutdown()
        Method shutdown all registry instances. Please use method with care! Make sure no other instances are using the cached remote instances before shutdown. Note: This method takes only effect in unit tests, otherwise this call is ignored. During normal operation there is not need for a manual registry shutdown because each registry takes care of its shutdown.

      • waitForData

        public static void waitForData()
                        throws org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException,
                               InterruptedException
        Method only returns if all available registries are synchronized.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException
        InterruptedException - is thrown if thread is externally interrupted.

      • isDataAvailable

        public static boolean isDataAvailable()

      • reinitialize

        public static void reinitialize()
                         throws org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException,
                                InterruptedException
        Method forces a resynchronization on all remote registries.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException
        InterruptedException

      • waitUntilReady

        public static void waitUntilReady()
                           throws InterruptedException,
                                  org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException
        Method blocks until all registries are not handling any tasks and are all consistent. Note: If you have just modified the registry this method can maybe return immediately if the task is not yet received by the registry controller. So you should prefer the futures of the modification methods for synchronization tasks.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - is thrown in case the thread was externally interrupted.
        org.openbase.jul.exception.CouldNotPerformException - is thrown if the wait could not be performed.
